turns.user_message: Find me a train out of Cambridge to london kings cross
turns.agent_response: There are 70 results. Is there a certain day or time you'd like to leave?
turns.reasoning: First turn - user starts Goal 1: finding a train from Cambridge to London

turns.user_message: I need it on Friday and it should arrive at London Kings Cross by 21:45.
turns.agent_response: TR1006 arrives at 19:51, would that work?
turns.reasoning: Continues train discussion, adding time constraints to same goal

turns.user_message: I guess that will work. Can you please make a booking for 3 people and when you are through may i also have the booking reference number.
turns.agent_response: Yes I have booked that for you and your reference number is E3M7QM9F.
turns.reasoning: Still discussing train booking, requesting reference number for same goal

turns.user_message: i also need a place to dine.
turns.agent_response: Is there a particular cuisine or location that I can recommend for you?
turns.reasoning: User switches to Goal 2: finding a place to dine - new domain/service

turns.user_message: Yes, British food in the West would be great!
turns.agent_response: Saint johns chop house serves british food in the west.
turns.reasoning: Continues restaurant discussion, specifying cuisine preferences

turns.user_message: What is the phone number and postcode to Saint Johns Chop House?
turns.reasoning: Same restaurant goal, but agent fails to provide requested postcode

turns.user_message: May I have the postcode as well ?
turns.reasoning: Still discussing same restaurant, agent provides requested postcode

turns.user_message: Great, thanks very much, that's all I need!
turns.agent_response: You're welcome. Have a nice day!
turns.reasoning: Closing exchange about same restaurant goal
